description:
Do not be fooled by the photos, there's nothing fishy about this cake!

Over 40% Off! Use the coupon code "40offSushi" to get a discount.

It's made entirely from sweet ingredients and candies but looks just like a Sushi Platter!

This course provides 15 chapters of step-by-step video cake making instructions, including equipment required, ingredients required and serving suggestions.

No special skills are required, if you can make off-the-shelf cake mix and the sort of recipes you see on the back of cereal boxes then you can make this cake.

The course is split chapter by chapter, with step-by-step video instructions, including chapters on equipment you will need, ingredients you will need, make the rice, nori, each sushi, making the base, icing the base, arranging the cake and serving the cake.

This course will enable you to make an amazingly real-looking sushi platter cake that's bound to attract photos and compliments!
title: Sushi Cake - Learn How to Make This Incredible Cake
